name: Mario's Mansion
overview: This mod swaps Mario and Luigi’s roles in Luigi’s Mansion, by making Mario the playable character and Luigi the one trapped in the painting. What’s Featured: An updated Mario model by TheHappyFaceKing with fixed glitchy polygons, a scared expression, and a detachable hat. (Toadette model also by TheHappyFaceKing.) Mario voiceclips that replace every Luigi voiceclip in the game. Fully modified in-game text that always refers to the player as “Mario” and the one in the painting as “Luigi.” A “Mario’s Mansion” title screen. Modified ‘dropped’ items, changing Mario’s hat to Luigi’s hat, and the color of Mario’s star from yellow to green. Various other details, such as a Mario icon for when the player speaks, red arms that open or try to open doors, and red-roofed mansions to earn at the end rather than green-roofed ones. And more. Mario and Toadette models by: TheHappyFaceKing
